forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 16C. Winds S at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 62F. Winds S at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thundershowers overnight following a period of rain early. Low 13C. SSW winds at 55 to 80 km/h, decreasing to 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with thundershowers overnight following a period of rain early. Low 56F. SSW winds at 35 to 50 mph, decreasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thunderstorms, especially in the morning. High around 15C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. High near 60F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain early with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SE at 65 to 95 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 130 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with thundershowers following a period of rain early. High 59F. Winds SE at 40 to 60 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers along with a few thunderstorms. Low 11C. SSW winds at 65 to 95 km/h, decreasing to 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 54F. SSW winds at 40 to 60 mph, decreasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with more showers at times. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
